name: 欧内斯特·沃尔顿
bio_short: 爱尔兰物理学家。他与约翰·考克饶夫（John Cockcroft）合作，建造了“科克罗夫特-沃尔顿发电机”，并首次用人工加速的粒子“分裂原子核”，因此获得了1951年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
bio_short_en: An Irish physicist who, with John Cockcroft, built the 'Cockcroft-Walton generator'. They were the first to 'split the atom' with artificially accelerated particles, for which they won the 1951 Nobel Prize in Physics.
